meanings.definition: Capybaras: large South American rodents with webbed feet and a barrel-shaped body.
meanings.sent1: Capybaras are known for their webbed feet and barrel-shaped bodies.
meanings.sent2: In the zoo, visitors can see capybaras roaming around their enclosure.
meanings.sent3: The capybaras at the pond were having a swimming race, showing off their webbed feet.
meanings.sent4: The capybaras in the field moved gracefully, their barrel-shaped bodies blending with the surroundings.
meanings.sent5: Children were excited to learn about capybaras, the large rodents from South America.
